trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint with a fixed <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"></xref> binding that automatically adds the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"></xref> behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto de extremidade padrão fixa <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"> </xref> associação que automaticamente adiciona o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"> </xref> comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Use this endpoint when you are writing a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service that is called from an ASP.NET AJAX application.
trans-unit.target: Use esse ponto de extremidade quando você estiver escrevendo um [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serviço que é chamado de um aplicativo ASP.NET AJAX.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"> </xref> classe com o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> especificado

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"> </xref> classe com o especificados <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>
O endereço do ponto de extremidade.
O tipo do ponto de extremidade.
